channel.title: Project BzL
channel.description:
[center][b]Project BzL[/b][/center]
[center][b]General Information :[/b][/center]
[B]Owner :[/B] [I]Kracya[/I] [b]Tester[s] :[/b] [i]Mastafu0[/i] [b]Current Programmers :[/b] [i]Kracya[/i] [b]Current Stage :[/b] [i]Developing[/i] [b]Looking For Programmer :[/b] [i]No[/i] [b]Looking For Tester :[/b] [i]No[/i]
[center][b]Tasks Completed :[/b][/center]
[B][x] Completely Wipe Cheez 63 Of Unneeded Crap
[ul][li]Add Weapon Handler[/li][li]Add MultiCombat Zones[/li][li]Add WorldObjects Handler[/li][li]Add Protection From Cheat Clients And DDoS[/li][li]Add Player Facing Player And Facing Npcs When Attacking[/li][li]Totally Disconnects Client When Attacking An Npc With Less Then 1 HP[/li][li]Fix Most Crash Bugs[/li][li]Prayer Head Icons[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Future Tasks :[/b][/center]
[B][_] Upgrade Packet Handling [_] Make Official Client Support Current Cache [_] Finish Skill Menus With Handler [_] Full Magic With SpellHandler [_] Full Ranged [_] All Skills With Handlers [_] Full Castle Wars With Handler [_] Full Fight Pits And Jad Mini Game With Handler [_] Start On Quests With Handler [_] Command Handler [_] Music Handler With Custom Songs Under Music Tab[/B]
[center][b]Current Tasks :[/b][/center] [b] [_] All Skill Menus
[ul][li]Skill Menu Handler[/li][li]Attack Menu[/li][li]Strength Menu[/li][li]Defense Menu[/li][li]Hitpoints Menu[/li][/ul] [_] Ranged Menu [_] Magic Menu [_] Prayer Menu [_] Runecrafting Menu [_] Mining Menu [_] Smithing Menu [_] Woodcutting Menu [_] Agility Menu [_] Thieving Menu [_] Herblore Menu [_] Farming Menu [_] Construction Menu [_] Crafting Menu [_] Fletching Menu [_] Slayer Menu [_] Fishing Menu [_] Cooking Menu [_] Firemaking Menu
[center][b]Other Information :[/b][/center]
[B]Why am I doing this? Well I am sick of this f--king bull$hit I see now.. "TestScape 4 lyfe!!!" My god, its time for another ACTUAL SOURCE to be released.. I doubt I will have it up to play, sorry to all private server players, but my goal is to make something good that people can base even better things on..
Special Thanks : Santa Clause l33tjake Mastafu0 Budda Rat Dawg[/B]
Have suggestions? Post them here.. Go ahead and post anything thats relevant to the topic here, if I see it turns into a spam fest I will have your posts deleted.

Well I am sick of this f–king bull$hit I see now… “TestScape 4 lyfe!!!” My god, its time for another ACTUAL SOURCE to be released… I doubt I will have it up to play, sorry to all private server players, but my goal is to make something good that people can base even better things on…
